title: "Any connections that (panel) contains will be closed" Y/N question always closes all
author: TDGalea
body_snippet:
When you have multiple connections open in a panel, and go to close mRemoteNG, the resulting "Are you sure?" message gives you a yes/no selection.
Choosing yes works as expected, and closes mRemoteNG. However, choosing **No** _also_ causes mRemoteNG to close.
It clearly doesn't expect this though, as it then asks "Do you want to close all open connections?" despite the main mRemoteNG window already being destroyed.
